sentence.text: The aim this study was to investigate the prevalence of single nucleotide polymorphisms in angiogenesis gene (LEP 3'UTR A/C, -2548 G/A) and LEPR (K109R and Q223R) and their association with Leptin level and obesity.
The K109R polymorphism was associated with obesity (P = .025) and seems to significantly decrease the angiogenesis levels (P AAAA .001).
Concerning angiogenesis G2548A polymorphism, our results showed that the OR of obesity associated with 2548 AA/GG was 1.87[1.106-2.78] P = .028 vs 1.41[1.035-1.85] P = .045 for 223AA/GG polymorphism.
